#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s;
		int k;
		cin>>s>>k;
		int n=s.size();
		int ans=0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			ans=ans*10 + (s[i]-'0');
			ans%=k;
		}
		if(ans==0)
			cout<<"YES\n";
		else
			cout<<"NO\n";
	}
}
